mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (user_account, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_profile, user_address, user_birth) VALUES (#{userAccount}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userProfile}, #{userAddress}, #{userBirth})
mapper.select: SELECT user_account , user_password , user_name , user_email , user_profile , user_address , user_birth , user_role , created_at , user_point FROM Users WHERE user_account = #{account}

SELECT user_account , user_password , user_name , user_email , user_profile , user_address , user_birth , user_role , created_at , user_point FROM Users WHERE user_email = #{email} AND user_name = #{name}
SELECT user_account , user_name , user_email ,limit_time FROM Users WHERE session_id = #{sessionId}
